```markdown
[![Docker Pulls](https://img.shields.io/docker/pulls/example/chat-server)](https://ghcr.io/example/chat-server)

A high-performance, Discord-compatible chat server built with Rust.
```

## Custom Badges

You can also create custom badges using shields.io:

```markdown

![Redis](https://img.shields.io/badge/redis-%23DD0031.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=redis&logoColor=white)
![Docker](https://img.shields.io/badge/docker-%230db7ed.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=docker&logoColor=white)
```
